official_title: Pilot Study of a 1-Millimeter Resolution Clinical PET System in Head and Neck Cancer Imaging
inclusion_criteria:
1. Biopsy-confirmed diagnosis of HNC
2. Patient scheduled to undergo surgery for HNC
3. Scheduled to have a PET/CT study on a conventional PET/CT system
4. Age greater than or equal to 19 years of age.
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 19 Years
exclusion_criteria: 1. Additional condition, or extenuating circumstance that, in the opinion of the investigator, may interfere with study compliance.
